title: Whatever
author: VD
content_html: John Scalzi considers the Big Idea behind The Irrational Atheist. And while Mr. Scalzi is a Confirmed Troublemaker, I highly advise behaving yourself in his house.
content_text:
John Scalzi considers
the Big Idea
behind
The Irrational Atheist
.  And while Mr. Scalzi is a Confirmed Troublemaker, I highly advise behaving yourself in his house.
